mapper.select: select p.PLACE_SERIAL PLACE_SERIAL, p.PARTNER_SERIAL PARTNER_SERIAL, p.PLACE_CODE PLACE_CODE, p.PLACE_NAME PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE LONGITUDE, p.GRADE GRADE, p.STATE STATE, r.reputation, p.LOCAL_CODE LOCAL_CODE from place p, review r where p.place_serial = r.place_serial and p.place_code = 4 and p.PARTNER_SERIAL is not null order by r.PLACE_SERIAL
